roleset.name: mode of motion
roleset.note: TRAMP-V NOTES: Frames file for 'tramp' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 51.3.2, Framenet entry Self motion. (from tramp.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: the one example
example.text: ``I 've ripped out a lot of Delicious'' and grafted the trees with many different shoots, says [Steve Wood, a West Lebanon, N.H., grower]-2, [*-2]tramping through his 100-acre Poverty Lane Orchard on a crisp autumn day recently.
